  • Method Details

    • fetchRent

      @GetMapping("/rents/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> fetchRent(@PathVariable("id") Integer id_rent)
      Fetches the rent by its ID from the database. Verifies if the rent exists and if the current user is authorized to access it.
      Parameters:
      id_rent - The ID of the rent to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the rent details and status code.

    • fetchAllRents

      @GetMapping("/rents/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> fetchAllRents() throws Exception
      Fetches all rents associated with the logged-in user from the database. Ensures only the rents related to the user's managed or tenanted apartments are returned.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the list of rents and status code.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while fetching the rents.

    • addNewRent

      @PutMapping("/managers/rents") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> addNewRent(@RequestBody Rent rent)
      Adds a new rent to the database. Validates the rent details and ensures the user is authorized to add the rent to the specified apartment.
      Parameters:
      rent - The rent object containing new rent details.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the status code.

    • updateRentById

      @PutMapping("/managers/rents/update") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updateRentById(@RequestBody Rent rent)
      Updates an existing rent in the database if it exists. Validates the rent details and ensures the user is authorized to update the rent.
      Parameters:
      rent - The rent object containing updated details.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the status code.

    • deleteRentById

      @DeleteMapping("/rent/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> deleteRentById(@PathVariable("id") Integer id_rent)
      Deletes the rent by its ID from the database. Ensures the rent exists and the current user is authorized to delete it.
      Parameters:
      id_rent - The ID of the rent to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity object containing the status code and message.
